Haircut.description: A stylish, customized cut designed for your individual fresh and trendy goals
A clean, precise haircut tailored for men's styles.
A fun, comfortable haircut for children
A quick trim to keep your bangs in shape and looking sharp

Color.description: Refresh your natural color with a precise root touch-up
Achieve vibrant, all-over color for a fresh, polished look
Enhance or correct your color with a custom toner application

Styling.description: A refreshing wash followed by a sleek style for short hair
A luxurious wash and professional styling for long, flowing locks
Elegant, sophisticated updo for special occasions or parties

Blonding Service.description: Add dimension with highlights focused on the top sections of your hair
Brighten your entire look with highlights from root to tip
Achieve a sun-kissed, natural-looking blend of highlights with a hand-painted technique
Get a seamless transition from dark to light with this dramatic, customized color technique
Lighten your hair all over with a professional bleaching service
Correct uneven or unwanted color for a flawless, balanced result
Maintain your bleached hair with a touch-up for consistent brightness

Hair Treatments.description: Achieve silky, frizz-free hair with a long-lasting smoothing treatment
Smooth and control frizz for a sleek, polished look
Restore moisture and shine with a nourishing deep conditioning session
A nourishing hair mask treatment designed to deeply hydrate and repair dry, damaged, or over-processed hair
A treatment that reconnects broken disulfide bonds in the hair restoring its natural integrity.

review_1.content: Donna is amazing! She gave me exactly the haircut I wanted. Her team is professional, welcoming, and trustworthy. Highly recommend!

review_2.content: Very professional and exactly the style I asked for. The head massage was a bonus! Excellent service. Will definitely come back.

review_3.content: Great value and professional service. Donwin listened to my preferences and delivered perfectly, even cleaning up my beard. Highly recommend!

review_4.content: Amazing balayage by Dana, Donna, and Donwin! They were professional, informative, and recommended great products. Totally worth it!

review_5.content: Awesome place! Friendly staff, amazing haircuts, and reasonable prices. Highly recommend this salon!

review_6.content: Loved my experience! Dana gave me a perfect cut, and the team was accommodating and professional. I’ll definitely return!

review_7.content: Tashina provided the best service ever! She was friendly and took great care of my hair. Highly recommend her!

review_8.content: Dana is incredible! She listened to my vision and delivered a perfect look with amazing attention to detail. Highly recommend!

review_9.content: Donna is the only stylist I trust for my thick, frizzy hair. She takes her time and provides excellent service every time.

staffs.name: Donna
staffs.description: Donna, the proud owner of Donna D’ Stylist Salon, is a licensed stylist with over 17 years of experience and a recognized Master Colorist. Known for her expertise in crafting stunning shades of brown, blonde, and silver, Donna excels in color corrections and creating customized, precise haircuts. Her journey spans roles such as Aveda Educator, Government Hair Examiner, and salon owner. Passionate about her craft, Donna continuously hones her skills by attending global hair shows and classes, ensuring she stays ahead of trends. Her mission is to help clients feel confident and transformed through personalized hair care.
certificates: Certificate of Completion – Scientific Marvel 2008 Certificate
Masterclass Certificate – Sassoon Academy Sta. Monica, California
trainings: Behind The Chair Show -2019 Washington DC
Paul Michell 'The Gathering' Color/Cut/Style with Paul Mitchell Team- 2012 Las Vegas, Nevada
Color Class Matrix Color – 2012 San Francisco California
Paul Mitchell 'The Gathering' Color /Cut/Style With Paul Mitchell Team – 2011 Las Vegas Nevada
Cutting Class with Celebrity Stylist Michael O’ Rourke, Los Angeles California
awards: Hair Fantasy Competition – Gold, Scientific Marvel
Avant-Garde Women’s Cut & Color, Competition – Gold, Scientific Marvel
Men’s Cut & Colour Competition -Silver, Scientific Marvel

staffs.name: Dana
staffs.description: Dana is a Senior stylist with over 4 years of experience in the hair industry. She has a strong interest in Asian-inspired hair hairstyles and is looking at creative ways to deliver modern looks. Dana likes being able to customize the look of her clients to suit their lifestyle and personality. In 2019, Dana attended the BTC Show to expand her knowledge in hair. From that show, she was inspired by influencer stylists to continue to work on her craft and improve as a hairdresser. Dana is an excellent listener and is ready to make her next guest’s haircut their best!
certificates: Certificate of Completion from the Scientific Marvel in 2017

staffs.name: Donwin
staffs.description: Donwin is a Junior Stylist who graduated from the Aveda Institute in May. He’s an eager hairstylist whose number one priority is making sure that you leave the salon feeling better than when you came in. Donwin is a well-rounded hairstylist and is studying barbering. He’s working hard and aspires to become Donna D’ Stylists best barber. He specializes in head massages and washes so he’s sure to leave you feeling relaxed and refreshed. Donwin’s head massages are based on Ayurvedic Head Massage techniques. He’s learned some of these techniques from Aveda and is continually working on improving this skill. He believes that the head wash at the sink is the most personable experience someone can ever have in the salon.
certificates: Certificate of Completion from the Aveda Institute Winnipeg in 2020

staffs.name: Tashina
staffs.description: Tashina Roulette is a Junior Stylist who graduated from the R.B. Russell Vocational Pre-industry Hairstyling Program in June 2021. She was at the top of her class earning several in-class and industry awards. Tashina specializes in braiding and is keen on improving her craft. She is creative, determined, dependable and hardworking. Tashina is eager to learn all about hair coloring and the variety of techniques involved.

staffs.name: Shae-D
staffs.description: Shae-D graduated top of her class from RB Russell Pre-industry Hairstyling Program, she is an apprentice stylist working towards her red seal certificate to become a full-time hairstylist. Shae-D specializes in color services especially when it comes to blondes as well as braiding hair. She loves doing creative designs. Changing someone's appearance and seeing them happy is a rewarding feeling.
